Pre-Game Insights: Dorival’s squad selection for the World Cup qualifiers suggests a shift towards Brazil-based players.
The team’s performance in the Copa América was disappointing, particularly in fullback and midfield positions.
There are concerns about the current squad’s ability to address the weak points identified during the Copa América.
Dorival’s choice to prioritize Brazil-based players may be influenced by pressure from Brazilian football interests or a desire to showcase local talent.
The upcoming match against Ecuador is seen as an opportunity for the team to improve its performance.
